# Introduction to the SRE Database

This website provides an atlas of cancer synergistic regulatory enhancer networks across different organ tissues. Designed for researchers and professionals, our platform offers an interactive, data-driven resource for exploring detailed tissue-specific data, including biosample metadata, experiment summaries, and genomic regulatory elements. Dive into organ- and tissue-specific pages, where you can explore curated data, conduct track selection, and visualize results in a genome browser to advance your research.

:::
:::

```{r cards, eval = F}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| results: asis

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
#  Create floating cards for each organ type that lists the available tissues.
#  When clicked, this brings the user to the organ-specific landing page that 
#  lists summary data on the available experiment types, genes, enhancers, etc.
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#--- FUNCTION TO CREATE CARD FOR EACH ORGAN ------------------------------------

create_card <- function(organ_row, tissue_data, image_map) {
  
  organ_name <- organ_row$ORGAN_NAME
  
  organ_id <- organ_row$ORGAN_ID
  
  # tissues <- tissue_data[tissue_data$ORGAN_ID == organ_id, ]
  
  tissues <- tissue_data %>% filter(ORGAN_ID == organ_row$ORGAN_ID) %>%
        
    pull(TISSUE_NAME) %>% paste0("<a href='#' class='tissue-link' data-organ='", 
        
    organ_row$ORGAN_NAME, "' data-tissue='", . , "'>", ., "</a>") %>% 
    
    paste(collapse = "<br>")
        
  image <- paste0("content/images/", gsub("\\s+", "", image_map[[organ_name]]))
  
  #-- Generate Card HTML
  
  card_html <- paste(
    
    "<div class='organ-card ", tolower(organ_name), "'>",
    "<div class='organ-card-image' style='background-image: url(\"", 
      image, "\")'></div>",
    "<div class='organ-card-header'>", toupper(organ_name), "</div>",
    "<div class='organ-card-body'>",
    "<p><b>Tissues:</b></p>",
    "<div>", tissues, "</div>",
    "</div>",
    "</div>"
  )
  
  return(card_html)
}

#--- GENERATE CARDS FOR ALL ORGANS ---------------------------------------------

cards_html <- lapply(seq_len(nrow(organ_data)), function(i) {
  
  create_card(organ_data[i, ], tissue_data, image_map)
})

#--- OUTPUT ORGAN CARDS --------------------------------------------------------

cat(do.call(paste, cards_html))

```

<script>
document.querySelectorAll('.tissue-link').forEach(link => {
  link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
    event.preventDefault();
    const organ = this.dataset.organ;
    const tissue = this.dataset.tissue;

    // Highlight Selected Tissue
    
    document.querySelectorAll('.tissue-link').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('selected'));
    this.classList.add('selected');

    // Fetch and Load Tissue Summary
    
    fetch(`/content/tissue_pages/${tissue}.html`)
      .then(response => response.text())
      .then(html => {
        document.querySelector('#main-content').innerHTML = html;
      });
  });
});

// CSS for Selected Tissue Link

document.styleSheets[0].insertRule(`
  .tissue-link.selected {
    color: #1B365D;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
`);
</script>
